Projects st_extent lat/lon list to sinusoidal raster Extent

Source: R/ebirdst-loading.R
get_sinu_ext.Rd

Internal function that converts the st_extent list used throughout this package from lat/lon corners to a raster Extent using the same Sinusoidal projection as the eBird Status and Trends products.

get_sinu_ext(st_extent)

Arguments

st_extent

list; st_extent list with lat/lon coordinates.

Value

A raster Extent in Sinusoidal projection.

Examples

# define st_extent list
ne_extent <- list(type = "rectangle",
                  lat.min = 40,
                  lat.max = 47,
                  lon.min = -80,
                  lon.max = -70,
                  t.min = 0.425,
                  t.max = 0.475)

# convert
sinu_e <- ebirdst:::get_sinu_ext(ne_extent)
sinu_e
#> class       : Extent 
#> xmin        : -6836828 
#> xmax        : -5286748 
#> ymin        : 4426967 
#> ymax        : 5247767
